item.title: Confirmed — 19 Billion Compromised Passwords Published Online
item.description: You must take action now, as security experts confirm 19 billion compromised passwords available to cybercriminals for use in account hacking attacks.

item.title: Google Issues New Windows Captcha Security Alert — Don’t Be Fooled
item.description: Google warns that this fake captcha attack will steal your credentials, logins and emails.
